game_description: Welcome to join the Journey through Time & Space in Checkers! Your journey starts on the spaceship, Checkers VR, afloat in the vast universe. The next stop is a pixel-styled anime arena. Onward, you are now in shining chaps and pleated shirt covered by a notched collar-styled waistcoat, a "Stetson" hat sitting on your head. Go explore and discover the free and wild west where you can freely utilize all your talents for designing and DIY exclusive piece models. Join us in this new journey now! Key Features: - Multiple Scenes: West Town & Spaceship & Pixel-styled Arena - Multiple AI difficulty levels available - Detailed & beginner-friendly instructions - Retro UI & Comfortable Interactions - Support Undo. No more mistakes! Download it now!
review_1: I really enjoyed playing this game. Simple yet, not boring. A few suggestions: 1) A few more locations to play in. 2) More choices of music. Love Boogie-Woogie, but it was not around in the old west. Maybe an old west-style song 3) More selection of A.I. players instead of just the two. 4) The ability to play against friends and family around the world. 5) There are times the game FORCES you to move a particular piece, one that I did not want to move, and was leaving it as a diversion because I have better & bigger plans. 6) Levels: Easy, normal, hard, expert, etc... 7) Have the A.I. get better as you get better. 8) Different colors for the checkers. (red, blue, pink, yellow, etc...) This game has great potential!
review_2: Where is the online mode to be able to play with freinds? Indicates that you can do this but no option?
review_3: I wish more developers would create board games for the Quest. This one is enjoyable.
review_4: It is a bare bones checkers vr game. There is no special boards, game modes, etc. There is not even a way to pick up pieces. You must drag and drop. But if you want a pure checkers vr game, well this is the one since there is not any competition.
